item.title: Dayjs Extension Usage
item.author: ingo@ingo-richter.io (Ingo Richter)
item.description: Enable extensions for dayjs I was working on a small project to sharpen my Javascript and Typescript skills. Nothing fancy. The project deals with data calculations, and I was looking for a modern replacement of momentjs. I found dayjs, which seemed to be a suitable replacement. As I mentioned, I had to find the number of days between the two dates. The documentation of dayjs mentioned a method to calculate the difference between two dates as duration.
